files.name: README.md
files.content:
# ryOS 8.2

A web-based operating system experience inspired by classic Mac OS System 7. Built using modern web technologies including React, Vite, TailwindCSS, and shadcn/ui components.

## Features
- Classic System 7 UI with authentic typography
- Multi-instance window management (drag, resize, maximize)
- File system with Documents, Applications, and Trash
- Multiple built-in applications with advanced features
- Local storage persistence
- Responsive design for all screen sizes
- System-wide themes and customization
- Backup and restore functionality
- AI-powered chat with speech synthesis and tool calling

## Built-in Applications
- **Finder**: Browse and manage your files
- **TextEdit**: Create and edit documents with markdown (now supports multiple windows)
- **Photo Booth**: Camera app with effects and filters
- **Control Panels**: Customize ryOS system settings
- **Minesweeper**: Classic puzzle game
- **Internet Explorer**: Time Machine with AI reimagined sites
- **Chats**: Chat with Ryo AI assistant (now with voice messages and speech synthesis)
- **Videos**: VCR-style video playlist player
- **iPod**: 1st-generation iPod with time-synced lyrics and translation

## Getting Started
- Double-click on any app icon to launch it
- Use the **Apple menu (🍎)** in the top-left to access system functions
- Files are automatically saved to your browser's storage
- Drag windows to move them, click and drag window edges to resize
- Use Control Panels to customize your experience

## Technical Details
- Built with React 18 and TypeScript
- Vite for fast development and bundling
- TailwindCSS for styling
- shadcn/ui components
- Bun as package manager
- Multi-instance window management system
- Advanced speech synthesis with text highlighting

Visit https://github.com/ryokun6/ryos for more information.

files.name: Quick Tips.md
files.content:
# Quick Tips

## Using Apps
- Launch apps from the Finder, Desktop, or Apple menu
- Multiple apps can run simultaneously
- Windows can be moved, resized, and minimized
- TextEdit now supports multiple windows - open different documents simultaneously
- Use Control Panels to customize your experience

## Finder
- Browse files in Documents, Applications, and Trash
- Navigate with back/forward buttons or path bar
- Sort files by name, kind, size, or date
- Multiple view options (icons, list)
- Move files to Trash and empty when needed
- Monitor available storage space
- Smart file opening detects if files are already open in TextEdit

## TextEdit
- Create and edit rich text documents
- Format text with bold, italic, and underline
- Align text and create ordered/unordered lists
- Use slash commands (/) for quick formatting
- Support for markdown syntax
- Task list support with checkboxes
- Auto-saves your work
- Export documents when needed
- **NEW**: Multi-window support - open multiple documents at once
- **NEW**: Each window maintains independent state
- **NEW**: Smart instance management prevents duplicate windows

## Photo Booth
- Take photos with your webcam
- Apply real-time effects:
  - Green Tint
  - High Contrast
  - Warm Vintage
  - Soft Sepia
  - Soft Focus
  - Black & White
  - Inverted
  - Green Boost
- Adjust brightness and contrast
- Multi-photo sequence mode
- Built-in photo gallery
- Export photos to Files
- Multiple camera support
- Flash effect on capture

## Control Panels
- Customize system appearance
  - Choose from tiled patterns or photos
  - Multiple categories of wallpapers
  - Real-time preview
- Manage system
  - Backup all settings
  - Restore from backup
  - Reset to defaults
  - Format file system

## Internet Explorer
- Browse historical web content
- Time travel with Wayback Machine
- Classic System 7 style interface
- Add websites to favorites
- View content from different years

## Chats with Ryo
- Natural conversation with Ryo AI
- Control system through chat
- Launch and manage apps
- Edit documents directly
- Get help with features
- Ask about design and concepts
- **NEW**: Push-to-talk voice messages with real-time transcription
- **NEW**: Text-to-speech for AI responses with word highlighting
- **NEW**: Nudge system (👋) for context-aware interactions
- **NEW**: ryOS FM DJ mode - Ryo becomes a radio DJ when music is playing
- **NEW**: Advanced tool calling for system integration
- **NEW**: Speech synthesis with volume controls
- **NEW**: Join chat rooms with @ryo mentions

## Videos
- VCR-style video playlist player
- Add and manage YouTube videos
- Shuffle and repeat modes
- LCD display with scrolling titles
- Classic CD player controls
- Playlist management
- Local storage for favorites

## iPod
- 1st-generation iPod-style music player
- Import YouTube URLs to build your music library
- Classic click-wheel navigation
- Shuffle and loop playback modes
- Create playlists and organize tracks
- **NEW**: Time-synced lyrics with multi-language translation
- **NEW**: Interactive lyric offset adjustment via gestures
- **NEW**: Multiple alignment modes (Focus Three, Alternating, Center)
- **NEW**: Chinese character variants (Traditional/Simplified)
- **NEW**: Korean romanization support
- **NEW**: Fullscreen lyrics mode with video support
- **NEW**: Real-time lyric highlighting during playback
- **NEW**: Gesture controls for lyric timing adjustments
- Library persisted locally for offline playback
